data.name: Gales of Nayeli
data.detailed_description:
Gales of Nayeli is a grid-based Strategy RPG coming to PC in 2023. In this enthralling SRPG adventure, you will meet and customize your party from a cast of over 35 varied and unique characters.

Inspired by classic SRPGs and JRPGs, Gales of Nayeli features an interactive campaign where your choices have lasting consequences throughout the entire game.





A wave of darkness looms over Iuven. Otherwise friendly woodland spirits and critters are starting to grow aggressive. Pirates and brigands are leading a unified assault on the Sunguard Kingdom. Underdark warriors are crawling out of caves across the world and attacking defenseless villages.

Something must be done.

After a mysterious stranger arrives in the forest on the outskirts of Chief Tuskalusa’s settlement, Nayeli, his daughter, leaves all she’s ever known in order to put an end to the increasing chaos spreading across the land.

Will it be enough to stop the imminent threat looming over Iuven?






Throughout the story, every character’s abilities in battle will increase tremendously. These increases aren’t simply reflected in their statistics. Entirely new abilities and movement options can be learned through experience.

You will also have a meaningful role to play in every character’s growth. The actions you take throughout the story will grant new skills to characters, both through story choices you make and through the use of skill scrolls, which can teach a skill to any character of your choice.

data.short_description: Face an impending darkness threatening the world of Iuven alongside Nayeli and an interesting cast of warriors. Control varied battlefields in Grid-Based Strategy RPG format while interweaving character relationships to the main conflict.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
